pullRequest.title: Liquibase - Record service classes implementation instead of  generating a native resource file for each service interface
pullRequest.bodyText:
This cleans up the extension processing part a little bit as we can record these info in a registry
and do a map lookup during runtime instead of reading the generated resource file for each service
class
Follows up this #8065 (comment) comment.

nodes.bodyText: Should we care about the order here (LinkedHashMap) ?

beforeCommit.message:
refactor(liquibase): record service classes implementation instead of generating a native resource file for each service interface

This cleans up the extension processing part a little bit as we can record these info in a registry
and do a map lookup during runtime instead of reading the generated resource file for each service
class
